name: WMcChat2
tagline: A web based Minecraft chat client
body:
### The MineChat of the future
Are you tired of having to keep your phone on you whenever you want to chat in Minecraft? Has your computer been unable to connect to a server and you want to join the fun? Now introducing: WMcChat2

### What is it?
WMcChat2 (Web Minecraft Chat) is a web-based Minecraft chat client, similar to MineChat. It is based off of it's [original project (WMcChat)](http://skepter.github.io/WMcChat/), however it now uses Node.JS instead of Java

### Current status
Version 0.3

### To do
Get a server and host this thing.

### Credits
Credits go to @PrismarineJS for creating the node-minecraft-protocol.

### Support or Contact
Stuck? Found a bug? Submit it to [my GitHub](https://github.com/Skepter/WMcChat2/issues)
